sentences.sContent: Visibility on the roads is down to 20 metres due to heavy fog.
sentences.sCn: 道路能见度因浓雾降至20米。

phrases.pCn: 不良能见度；能见度不良；较差能见度

words.tran: 明显的；看得见的；现有的；可得到的
视力；美景；眼力；幻象；想象力
可见物；进出口贸易中的有形项目

trans.tranCn: 能见度，可见性；能见距离；明显性
trans.tranOther: the distance it is possible to see, especially when this is affected by weather conditions
